body_html:
I was able to successfully reproduce this issue (by creating a symlink to gcc and alluding to that in ./configure)

looks like somehow the code in https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/third_party/gpus/crosstool/clang/bin/crosstool_wrapper_driver_is_not_gcc.tpl can't access cc1plus which is usually installed with g++

$locate cc1plus
/usr/lib/gcc/x86_64-linux-gnu/4.8/cc1plus

body:
I was able to successfully reproduce this issue (by creating a symlink to gcc and alluding to that in ./configure)

looks like somehow the code in https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/third_party/gpus/crosstool/clang/bin/crosstool_wrapper_driver_is_not_gcc.tpl can't access cc1plus which is usually installed with g++

$locate cc1plus
/usr/lib/gcc/x86_64-linux-gnu/4.8/cc1plus
